NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: The Mane Choice Pink Lemonade & Coconut Curl Boosting Sherbet
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Pink Lemonade & Coconut Curl Boosting Sherbet is a lightweight styling cream that boosts curl definition and tames frizz. It is packed with antioxidants to help protect hair from environmental aggressors. It boosts curl definition & fights frizz, it's great for wash-and-gos, twist-outs, & braid-outs, and it conditions, protects, and makes hair feel soft
NaturalHairProducts.WhereToBuy: TJ Maxx, Walmart, TheManeChoice.com, and Amazon, Local Beauty Supply

NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: Jamaican Mango and Lime Black Castor Oil
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Moisturize, rejuvenate and soften your hair with this Jamaican Mango and Lime Black Castor Oil. Infused with a blend of organic herbs and nourishing ingredients, the shine-enhancing castor oil effortlessly promotes healthy hair growth. Suitable for all hair types, the moisturizing hair oil is paraben-free and infused with a soothing aroma, making it great for a relaxing head massage or hot oil treatment.
NaturalHairProducts.WhereToBuy: Target, Walmart, Amazon, TJ Maxx, Sally Beauty, Local Beauty Supply

NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: Shea Moisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Hair Masque
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: SheaMoisture's Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Treatment Masque with Shea Butter, Peppermint & Apple Cider Vinegar restores strength and resilience to damaged, brittle or chemically processed hair. The deep conditioning masque helps promote natural growth by supporting hair¿s elasticity, reducing the appearance of breakage and shedding.
NaturalHairProducts.WhereToBuy: Target, Walmart, Sally Beauty, Local Beauty Supply

NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: Palmer's Cocoa Butter + Biotin Length Retention Deep Conditioner
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Palmer’s Cocoa Butter Formula® Length Retention system with Biotin, fully strengthens hair with powerhouse natural protectants that help block fragileness, brittleness, breakage and split ends, to help hair achieve its optimal length. Silicone free, intense revitalizing treatment, restores elasticity and shine, while sealing in moisture.
NaturalHairProducts.WhereToBuy: Walmart, Target, Amazon, Local Beauty Supply

NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: Emerge Your Mane Bestie Leave-In Conditioner
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Emerge's "My Mane BFF" leave-in conditioner is a hair conditioner made with Pequi Oil and fair trade Shea Butter to hydrate frizzy curls; this daily conditioner brings rich moisture and slip. Made with Pequi Oil, this Emerge conditioner for curly and frizz-prone hair can be used as a daily conditioner for frizz-free curls every day. It's a perfect conditioner for curls on the go.

NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: TPH by TARAJI Master Cleanse Scalp Treatment Wash
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Master Cleanse is our secret sauce, finally perfected and ready for you! This tingling, refreshing, and rebalancing formula helps dissolve scalp build-up providing a clean, balanced environment for healthier, natural hair. Whether you're wearing protective styles (like weaves & braids) or going au naturel, our exclusive tri-touch applicator deep dives to the areas you can't get to with just your fingertips.

NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: Design Essentials Almond Avocado Leave In Conditioner
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Our Almond & Avocado Detangling Leave-In Conditioner delivers lightweight moisturizing that instantly replenishes your strands with nutrients lost through everyday styling routines, weather, and environmental factors. This nourishing formula penetrates strands quickly to soften and smooth the cuticle for easy detangling and the ultimate frizz control.
NaturalHairProducts.WhereToBuy: Ulta Beauty, JC Penny, Walmart, Target, Local Beauty Supply

NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Bounce is a one & done styling cream that can be used alone to achieve the perfect balance of bouncy, defined, shiny, and hydrated hairstyles such as wash and go’s, twist-outs, braid-outs, or any style where you are looking for amazing definition without the crunch! No need to pair a leave-in conditioner with this product.
TGIN's Twist and Define Cream is derived from coconut oil and vitamin E, creating smooth and shiny twist outs that feature long-lasting definition.
NaturalHairProducts.WhereToBuy: Bed Bath & Beyond, Sally's Beauty, Amazon, Rite Aid, Local Beauty Supply

NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Creamy, luxurious & boosted with a blend of glorious oils, PATTERN's Hydration Shampoo helps curls & coils dance in a wash of liquid sunshine. This gentle, moisturizing formula softly lathers to cleanse your hair & scalp removing build-up & dirt without stripping away moisture.

NaturalHairProducts.ProductName: TGIN Miracle RepaiRx Curl Food Daily Moisturizer
NaturalHairProducts.ProductDescription: Restores nutrients in hair, hydrates dry, damaged, and color treated hair, reduces frizz and fly aways, promotes healthy hair growth, shine, and softness, no parabens, sulfates, petrolatum, lanolin, artificial colors, or animal testing.
